<script setup>
import { productsStore } from "@/stores/productsStore";

const productStore = productsStore();
let text = ref

</script>
<template>
  <input
    type="text"
    placeholder="Введите или выберите товар..."
    v-model="productStore.text"
     @keypress.enter="productStore.text=text"
  />
</template>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
input {
  width: 100%;
  height: 60px;
  margin-bottom: 50px;
  background-color: white;
  padding: 20px;
  border-radius: 10px;
  border: 1px solid #f0f0f0;
  font-size: medium;
  font-weight: 400;
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 30px rgba(2, 154, 173, 0.15);
}
input:focus {
  outline: none;
}
</style>
